meta.title: ee partners | AI Solutions for Architecture
meta.description: AI solutions designed for TStudio. From tender analysis to project coordination.

hero.headline: The intelligence that
hero.subtitle: Three AI solutions designed for TStudio. From tender analysis to project coordination.

solutions.title: Choose a
solutions.subtitle: Each tool is designed for a specific and measurable impact on your practice

a.title: Tender Screening AI
a.subtitle: Automated Tender Analysis & Bid Generation
a.description: Every tender deserves attention. Because no opportunity should be missed.

sub1.title: Intelligent Requirements Extraction
sub1.description: The AI agent analyzes each tender, automatically extracting all requirements, categorizing them by type, and assigning priorities. All before you even open a meeting.
sub1.bullet1: Automatic categorization: Eligibility, Technical, Deliverables, Timelines
sub1.bullet2: Identification of mandatory vs. optional requirements
sub1.bullet3: Automatic assignment of responsible parties for each requirement
sub1.highlight: It knows your tenders before you even read them.
sub1.scenario: The system receives a tender for the Messina waterfront redevelopment, extracts 47 requirements in 3 minutes, and identifies 5 missing documents in the practice’s dossier.

sub2.title: Intelligent Go/No-Go
sub2.description: Structured evaluation across 4 dimensions with AI scoring and automatic recommendation. The Tender Lead retains final control.
sub2.bullet1: Capability Fit: alignment between practice expertise and tender requirements
sub2.bullet2: Timeline Fit: schedule feasibility relative to current workload
sub2.bullet3: Fee Potential and Strategic Fit: financial and strategic potential
sub2.highlight: The right decision, at the right time, with the right data.
sub2.scenario: For a restoration tender in Rome, the system detects a 92% match with the practice’s profile based on the Crypta Balbi experience and recommends GO with high priority.

sub3.title: Automatic Bid Pack Generation
sub3.description: Automatically generates the first draft of the bid package: Executive Summary, Approach, Team, Similar Projects, Risk Register.
sub3.bullet1: Executive Summary based on the practice’s strengths
sub3.bullet2: Automatic selection of similar projects from the TStudio portfolio
sub3.bullet3: Compliance checklist for every mandatory requirement
sub3.highlight: The right document, ready in minutes instead of days.
sub3.scenario: For the Messina Waterfront tender, the system generates a complete draft in 15 minutes, automatically including references to Molo San Cataldo as a comparable project.

b.title: Knowledge Base AI
b.subtitle: Your Practice’s Memory, Always Accessible
b.description: Stop searching. Ask and get answers.

sub1.title: Intelligent Document Ingestion
sub1.description: Upload PDFs, notes, emails, project pages. The AI indexes everything, creates automatic tags, and links documents to projects.
sub1.bullet1: Multi-upload: PDF, DOCX, emails, meeting notes
sub1.bullet2: Automatic tagging by project, type, date
sub1.highlight: Every document finds its place. Automatically.
sub1.scenario: The practice uploads 150 documents related to the 4 main projects. The system indexes them in 10 minutes, creates 23 automatic tags, and identifies 12 links between documents.

sub2.title: Chat AI with Citations
sub2.description: Ask anything about the practice’s projects, processes, and documents. Every answer includes precise citations to source documents.
sub2.bullet1: Answers based exclusively on internal documents
sub2.bullet3: If the information is not in the knowledge base, it clearly states so
sub2.highlight: Your practice’s memory, just a question away.
sub2.scenario: "Who is the client for the Messina Waterfront?" — The AI answers: "Autorità di Sistema Portuale dello Stretto – Messina" [CITE: TS-P-0001] in under 30 seconds.

sub3.title: Precedent Pack Generator
sub3.description: With one click, generate a package of similar projects to support a new tender. Automatic selection based on typology, scale, and expertise.
sub3.bullet2: Complete project sheet with key facts and citations
sub3.bullet3: Export ready for inclusion in the bid
sub3.highlight: Your best projects, always ready to support the next tender.
sub3.scenario: For a new waterfront tender, the system automatically selects Messina Waterfront and Molo San Cataldo as precedents, generating complete sheets with citations.

c.title: Project Coordination AI
c.subtitle: From Meetings to Decisions, Automatically
c.description: No more lost minutes. Every decision tracked.

sub1.title: From Meetings to Concrete Actions
sub1.description: Paste the transcript or meeting notes. The AI extracts decisions, actions, owners, deadlines, and risks in a structured format.
sub1.bullet1: Automatic decision extraction with evidence from the transcript
sub1.bullet2: Task creation with owner, deadline, and dependencies
sub1.bullet3: Risk identification with severity and triggers
sub1.scenario: After a Messina Waterfront meeting, the system extracts 5 decisions, 8 actions with owners, and 2 high-severity risks in under one minute.

sub2.title: Intelligent Action Board
sub2.description: Automatic kanban board that organizes all actions by status (Open, Blocked, Done), project, and owner. Always up to date.
sub2.bullet1: Kanban view with filters by project and owner
sub2.bullet3: Automatic alerts for overdue or blocked tasks
sub2.highlight: The control you need, without the bureaucracy that slows you down.
sub2.scenario: The Project Manager sees at a glance that 3 Waterfront tasks are blocked by a client decision on access ramps, with a deadline in 5 days.

sub3.title: Automatic Weekly Report
sub3.description: Generates client-safe weekly reports by automatically aggregating tasks, decisions, risks, and progress. Ready to send.
sub3.bullet1: Sections: Progress, Next Week Plan, Open Issues, Decisions Required
sub3.bullet3: Based exclusively on actual project data
sub3.highlight: The perfect report, every week, in 5 minutes.
sub3.scenario: Every Friday, the system automatically generates the weekly report for the Messina Waterfront, including 3 progress updates, 2 open risks, and 1 decision required from the client.

howWeWork.title: How we
howWeWork.subtitle: A business-oriented methodology.
howWeWork.step1desc: We start by listening. We analyze TStudio’s processes, tenders, and opportunities. Every solution stems from a real understanding of your business, not a template.
howWeWork.step2desc: We identify where artificial intelligence can generate the greatest impact in your practice: tender efficiency, institutional memory, project coordination.
howWeWork.step3desc: We build tools tailored to TStudio. Every interface, every workflow, every output is designed for the way you work.
howWeWork.step4desc: Comprehensive team training and ongoing support. Our goal is for the tools to become a natural part of your daily workflow.

impact.title: Two dimensions of
impact.subtitle: Each solution generates value on two fronts: cost reduction and competitiveness growth.
impact.col1item2: Reduced time searching for internal documents
impact.col1item3: Automated reports instead of manual compilation
impact.col2item1: More complete and accurate tender bids
impact.col2item2: Knowledge base always up to date and accessible
impact.case1desc: Investment in AI automation for repetitive operational activities: tenders, document search, reporting.
impact.case2desc: Investment in AI for dynamic pricing and personalized upselling: bid quality, project coordination.
